staxel.village.character.dialogue.MorelL: (안함)Here I thought I had discovered a new intelligent species...
(안함)But there's still hope! Mushrooms may still someday walk!
(안함)As annoyed as I may be with ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;, I suppose she did this with my best interests in mind...
(안함)Did she think I wasn't fitting in with the others?
(안함)I was merely focusing my attention elsewhere...
(안함)Did you know there are some breeds that can control the minds of small creatures?
